packagegui.name: frr_bgp_communities
packagegui.title: Services/FRR/BGP

field.description:
The name of this BGP Community.
Use 1-99 for a standard community list (AS:VAL pairs), 100-500 for an expanded community list (Regular Expression Matching), or enter a text name combined with the selected type.
Type of Community List to specify, which controls how the list operates. The selected type must match the Name appropriately.

option.name: Standard (AS:VAL pair or Well-Known Community list)

field.description:
BGP Communities determine AS membership and priority values in BGP-specific contexts such as route-maps.
This is a space-separated list of communities in AS:VAL format, or a well-known community: internet, no-export, no-advertise, or local-as.
Expanded Community List entries specify an ordered list using a regular expression.

rowhelperfield.description: Permit or deny access to a network.
